backend/main.mo: Defines a large set of backend types for technologies, device components, and research status inside a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented game features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summary describing office scene preset configurations for different level ranges.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main router, theme provider, and page routes for core game sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for firstâ€‘time users to enter their name and create a profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameLayou: Wraps all pages with navigation and conditionally shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/nav/MainNav.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with links, icons, welcome text, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/features/cloud-saves/SaveSl: UI panel to view, create, load, rename, and delete cloud save slots using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/features/competitors/Compet: Displays competitor cards showing strategy, stats, and strength progress from the competitor store.
frontend/src/features/competitors/compet: Zustand store managing competitor data with initialization and update helpers.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/MetricsP: Renders static dashboard metric cards with values, trends, and optional progress bars.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Blue: Lists device blueprints with key specs and provides release and edit actions.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/desi: Static catalog mapping device categories to available design definitions.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Desi: Shows available design options for a category and lets the user select a design visually.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/devi: Provides a default device blueprint factory with all fields initialized.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Devi: Form-based editor to create device blueprints using default templates and save via API.
frontend/src/features/investments/Invest: UI panel for creating investments like acquisitions, marketing, and recruitment, updating cash and logging investments.
Displays a scrollable history of past investments with icons, amounts, descriptions, and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/investments/invest: Zustand store persisting up to 100 investment records and providing an addInvestment method.
Scrollable UI feed showing recent market events with icons, descriptions, and day labels.
frontend/src/features/market/marketFeedS: Zustand store for market events, allowing adding new events and keeping the latest 100.
frontend/src/features/new-game/difficult: Defines starting values and modifiers for normal and challenging game difficulties.
frontend/src/features/new-game/NewGameMo: Modal to start a new game by selecting a difficulty preset and initializing game state.
frontend/src/features/office/Office3DVie: 3D office viewer using React Three Fiber that renders furniture based on office level.
frontend/src/features/office/officeScene: Preset lighting and furniture layouts for different office level ranges used by the 3D viewer.
frontend/src/features/office/officeStore: Zustand store managing office level and upgrade cost, with logic for leveling up to a max of 20.
frontend/src/features/office/OfficeUpgra: Panel showing office level, stats, upgrade cost, and a button to perform upgrades if affordable.
frontend/src/features/products/ReleasePr: Modal for configuring and releasing a product, calculating total cost and updating game state cash.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchD: Panel displaying technology details, prerequisites, and allows starting research if conditions are met.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchL: Lists technologies with search and category filtering and opens details panel for a selected item.
frontend/src/features/research/techDatas: Generates a large mock dataset of technologies with categories, effects, costs, and requirements.
frontend/src/features/simulation/simulat: Manages simulation loop that advances days, triggers competitor events, and updates market and competitor state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for user profiles, blueprints, technologies, research, and save slots with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light and dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CloudSavesPage.tsx: Cloud saves page showing login prompt or save slots panel based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorsMarketPage: Page displaying competitor list and market feed via tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing game metrics, simulation controls, and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceStudioPage.tsx: Device studio page with tabs for editing and listing device blueprints.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentsPage.tsx: Investments page combining action panel and investment log.
frontend/src/pages/OfficePage.tsx: Office management page showing upgrade panel and 3D viewer.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPage.tsx: Research page listing available technologies to unlock.
frontend/src/state/gameState.ts: Zustand store persisting game state with helpers to update cash, techs, and products.
frontend/src/state/saveGameStore.ts: Zustand store for active save ID and local save data with persistence.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining content paths, dark mode, extended theme tokens, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a business-simulator game, its features list, required images, and current project state version.
